snippet: Authorities detained nearly 2,000 people as part of a nationwide crackdown on the sale of fake or counterfeit drugs and health care products, according to a report Sunday from Xinhua, the official news agency.
abstract: Chinese government authorities detain nearly 2,000 people as part of a nationwide crackdown on the sale of fake or counterfeit drugs and health care products.
lead_paragraph: Authorities detained nearly 2,000 people as part of a nationwide crackdown on the sale of fake or counterfeit drugs and health care products, according to a report Sunday from Xinhua, the official news agency.

headline.seo: China Arrests 2,000 in Counterfeit Drug Crackdown
headline.main: 2,000 Arrested in China in Counterfeit Drug Crackdown
headline.print_headline: China Arrests Nearly 2,000 In Counterfeit Drug Crackdown
